member.name: T:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.AMMediaType
member.summary: The structure describes the format of a media sample.

member.summary: Globally unique identifier (GUID) that specifies the major type of the media sample.

member.summary: GUID that specifies the subtype of the media sample.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.AMMediaType.FixedSizeSamples
member.summary: If true, samples are of a fixed size.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.AMMediaType.TemporalCompression
member.summary: If true, samples are compressed using temporal (interframe) compression.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.AMMediaType.SampleSize
member.summary: Size of the sample in bytes. For compressed data, the value can be zero.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.AMMediaType.FormatType
member.summary: GUID that specifies the structure used for the format block.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.AMMediaType.unkPtr
member.summary: Not used.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.AMMediaType.FormatSize
member.summary: Size of the format block, in bytes.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.AMMediaType.FormatPtr

member.summary: Dispose the object

member.summary: The structure describes the bitmap and color information for a video image.

member.summary: structure that specifies the source video window.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.VideoInfoHeader.TargetRect
member.summary: structure that specifies the destination video window.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.VideoInfoHeader.BitRate
member.summary: Approximate data rate of the video stream, in bits per second.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.VideoInfoHeader.BitErrorRate
member.summary: Data error rate, in bit errors per second.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.VideoInfoHeader.AverageTimePerFrame
member.summary: The desired average display time of the video frames, in 100-nanosecond units.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.VideoInfoHeader.BmiHeader
member.summary: structure that contains color and dimension information for the video image bitmap.

member.name: T:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.BitmapInfoHeader
member.summary: The structure contains information about the dimensions and color format of a device-independent bitmap (DIB).

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.BitmapInfoHeader.Size
member.summary: Specifies the number of bytes required by the structure.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.BitmapInfoHeader.Width
member.summary: Specifies the width of the bitmap.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.BitmapInfoHeader.Height
member.summary: Specifies the height of the bitmap, in pixels.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.BitmapInfoHeader.Planes
member.summary: Specifies the number of planes for the target device. This value must be set to 1.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.BitmapInfoHeader.BitCount
member.summary: Specifies the number of bits per pixel.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.BitmapInfoHeader.Compression
member.summary: If the bitmap is compressed, this member is a FOURCC the specifies the compression.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.BitmapInfoHeader.ImageSize
member.summary: Specifies the size, in bytes, of the image.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.BitmapInfoHeader.XPelsPerMeter
member.summary: Specifies the horizontal resolution, in pixels per meter, of the target device for the bitmap.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.BitmapInfoHeader.YPelsPerMeter
member.summary: Specifies the vertical resolution, in pixels per meter, of the target device for the bitmap.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.BitmapInfoHeader.ColorsUsed
member.summary: Specifies the number of color indices in the color table that are actually used by the bitmap.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.BitmapInfoHeader.ColorsImportant
member.summary: Specifies the number of color indices that are considered important for displaying the bitmap.

member.summary: Specifies the y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.

member.summary: Specifies the x-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the rectangle.

member.name: F:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.RECT.Bottom
member.summary: Specifies the y-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the rectangle.

member.name: T:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IFilterGraph
member.summary: The interface provides methods for building a filter graph. An application can use it to add filters to the graph, connect or disconnect filters, remove filters, and perform other basic operations.

member.summary: Adds a filter to the graph and gives it a name.
member.param: Filter to add to the graph.

member.summary: Removes a filter from the graph.
member.param: Filter to be removed from the graph.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IFilterGraph.EnumFilters(System.IntPtr@)
member.summary: Provides an enumerator for all filters in the graph.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IFilterGraph.FindFilterByName(System.String,Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IBaseFilter@)
member.summary: Finds a filter that was added with a specified name.
member.param: Name of filter to search for.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IFilterGraph.ConnectDirect(Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin,Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin,Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.AMMediaType)
member.summary: Connects two pins directly (without intervening filters).
member.param: Media type to use for the connection.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IFilterGraph.Reconnect(Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin)
member.summary: Breaks the existing pin connection and reconnects it to the same pin.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IFilterGraph.Disconnect(Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin)
member.summary: Disconnects a specified pin.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IFilterGraph.SetDefaultSyncSource
member.summary: Sets the reference clock to the default clock.

member.name: T:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.ISampleGrabber
member.summary: The interface is exposed by the Sample Grabber Filter. It enables an application to retrieve individual media samples as they move through the filter graph.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.ISampleGrabber.SetOneShot(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Specifies whether the filter should stop the graph after receiving one sample.
member.param: Boolean value specifying whether the filter should stop the graph after receiving one sample.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.ISampleGrabber.SetMediaType(Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.AMMediaType)
member.summary: Specifies the media type for the connection on the Sample Grabber's input pin.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.ISampleGrabber.GetConnectedMediaType(Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.AMMediaType)
member.summary: Retrieves the media type for the connection on the Sample Grabber's input pin.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.ISampleGrabber.SetBufferSamples(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Specifies whether to copy sample data into a buffer as it goes through the filter.
member.param: Boolean value specifying whether to buffer sample data. If true, the filter copies sample data into an internal buffer.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.ISampleGrabber.GetCurrentBuffer(System.Int32@,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Retrieves a copy of the sample that the filter received most recently.
member.param: Pointer to the size of the buffer. If pBuffer is NULL, this parameter receives the required size.
Pointer to a buffer to receive a copy of the sample, or NULL.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.ISampleGrabber.GetCurrentSample(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Not currently implemented.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.ISampleGrabber.SetCallback(Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.ISampleGrabberCB,System.Int32)
member.summary: Specifies a callback method to call on incoming samples.
member.param: interface containing the callback method, or NULL to cancel the callback.

member.name: T:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin
member.summary: This interface is exposed by all input and output pins of DirectShow filters.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin.Connect(Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin,Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.AMMediaType)
member.summary: Connects the pin to another pin.
member.param: Type to use for the connections (optional).

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin.ReceiveConnection(Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin,Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.AMMediaType)
member.summary: Makes a connection to this pin and is called by a connecting pin.
member.param: Media type of the samples to be streamed.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin.Disconnect
member.summary: Breaks the current pin connection.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin.ConnectedTo(Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin@)
member.summary: Returns a pointer to the connecting pin.
member.param: Receives IPin interface of connected pin (if any).

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin.ConnectionMediaType(Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.AMMediaType)
member.summary: Returns the media type of this pin's connection.
member.param: Pointer to an structure. If the pin is connected, the media type is returned. Otherwise, the structure is initialized to a default state in which all elements are 0, with the exception of lSampleSize, which is set to 1, and FixedSizeSamples, which is set to true.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin.QueryPinInfo(Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.PinInfo@)
member.summary: Retrieves information about this pin (for example, the name, owning filter, and direction).
member.param: structure that receives the pin information.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin.QueryDirection(Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.PinDirection@)
member.summary: Retrieves the direction for this pin.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin.QueryId(System.String@)
member.summary: Retrieves an identifier for the pin.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin.QueryAccept(Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.AMMediaType)
member.summary: Queries whether a given media type is acceptable by the pin.
member.param: structure that specifies the media type.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin.EnumMediaTypes(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Provides an enumerator for this pin's preferred media types.
member.param: Address of a variable that receives a pointer to the IEnumMediaTypes interface.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin.QueryInternalConnections(System.IntPtr,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Provides an array of the pins to which this pin internally connects.
member.param: Address of an array of IPin pointers.
On input, specifies the size of the array. When the method returns, the value is set to the number of pointers returned in the array.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin.EndOfStream
member.summary: Notifies the pin that no additional data is expected.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin.BeginFlush
member.summary: Begins a flush operation.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin.EndFlush
member.summary: Ends a flush operation.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IPin.NewSegment(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Double)
member.summary: Specifies that samples following this call are grouped as a segment with a given start time, stop time, and rate.
member.param: Start time of the segment, relative to the original source, in 100-nanosecond units.
End time of the segment, relative to the original source, in 100-nanosecond units.
Rate at which this segment should be processed, as a percentage of the original rate.

member.name: T:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IMediaControl
member.summary: The interface provides methods for controlling the flow of data through the filter graph. It includes methods for running, pausing, and stopping the graph.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IMediaControl.Run
member.summary: Runs all the filters in the filter graph.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IMediaControl.Pause
member.summary: Pauses all filters in the filter graph.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IMediaControl.Stop
member.summary: Stops all the filters in the filter graph.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IMediaControl.GetState(System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Retrieves the state of the filter graph.
member.param: Duration of the time-out, in milliseconds, or INFINITE to specify an infinite time-out.
è˜Ÿriable that receives a member of the FILTER_STATE enumeration.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IMediaControl.RenderFile(System.String)
member.summary: Builds a filter graph that renders the specified file.
member.param: Name of the file to render

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IMediaControl.AddSourceFilter(System.String,System.Object@)
member.summary: Adds a source filter to the filter graph, for a specified file.
member.param: Name of the file containing the source video.
Receives interface of filter information object.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IMediaControl.get_FilterCollection(System.Object@)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of the filters in the filter graph.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IMediaControl.get_RegFilterCollection(System.Object@)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of all the filters listed in the registry.
member.param: Receives the IDispatch interface of IAMCollection object.

member.name: M:Oraycn.MPlayer.Engine.DShow.Core.IMediaControl.StopWhenReady
member.summary: Pauses the filter graph, allowing filters to queue data, and then stops the filter graph.
